title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Jul 7 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Jul 7 2022
description:
Stacey Abrams, who sits on a board advocating to defund the police, has spent over $520k on private security guards in the past four months. "Defund the Police" is the dumbest political slogan in our lifetime. Black Lives Matter has led to more deaths than any other political movement in the last 60 years. Fake Native American, Elizabeth Warren: We need to put an end to "deceptive" crisis pregnancy centers. Oklahoma Governor Kevin Stitt joins C&B to discuss his state's response to covid -- "You don't put your Constitution in the attic when there's a pandemic" -- and to Biden's treatment of the National Guard, and how red states are leading the way in job creation. Someone blew up America’s weird "Stonehenge."

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
